title: Intelligent Services JourneyAI Engagement Scores
description: This mixin contains JourneyAI Engagement Scores, which provides individual customer's propensities to engage with a message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: journeyAI
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: JourneyAI intelligent services provides various insights about message deliveries along customer's journey

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: engagementScores
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: JourneyAI Engagement Scores provide likelihoods of a customer engaging with a newly delivered message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailEngagementScores
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Engagement scores for email channel messages

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailClickEngagementScore
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: probability for a customer to click on links in an email

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailOpenEnagementScore
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: probability of a customer to open an email

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailRetentionLevel
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: qualitative categorization of customer's likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailRetentionPercentRank
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: percentile rank of the likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: emailUnsubscriptionProbability
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: the probability for recipient to unsubscribe from email channel given one email opened

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: engagementScoresInfo
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: model version and score date as a concatenated string
